author: donaldp
msg: Rework SarURLConnection so that it only uses the JarFile passed inot it's constructor. This means that only one JarFile object will be created for whole Sar.

msg: Make sure Jar is verified and opened for read-only access.

author: donaldp
msg: Only create a SarURLStreamHandlerFactory if the source is a file as you should not need sar: urls at any other time. Pass in the JarFile object to factory.
